answers.answer: Hi....wondering do u have a family medical history with diabetes? This is something u should check into as well since u said u skipped a meal...This is something a Dr should be able to help u with.....did u give ur Dr all the info u mentioned above?

Thanks for the response..no we dnt have any person with diabetes in my family..and i told to doctor abt these and he told it might be because of tension headache or because of eye sight(if i have).he gave tablets to use..and told me to check..
i feel hunger in the eveng if i did not eat in afternoon...and then i will slowly get headache ...
according to syntoms i am thinking that its a Migraine Headache....

question: Dear Doctor,I am a Software Professional ...When i skip my meal in afternoon and  take some juice or some thing like bread.In the Evening i suddenly get hands slightly hands shivered and slowly i am getting severe headache followed by weakness and also vomiting sensation .Headache is very severe .Please suggest me what to do??What may be the cause ?I already consulted doctor and he said it may be tension headache.Please suggest meThanks in Advance
title: Getting headache
